title: Consolidate Financial Statements
description: An accountant needs to consolidate the financial statements of a parent company and its three subsidiaries.

tasks.description: Retrieve the individual financial statements for the parent company and all subsidiaries.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully gathers all four sets of financial statements.

tasks.description: Identify and process all intercompany transactions that need to be eliminated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies and lists all intercompany loans and sales.

tasks.description: Generate the consolidated balance sheet and income statement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces the final consolidated financial reports.
